name: Automatit, Inc.
description:
Automatit, Inc is a web development, design, and marketing company.
In 2005, Automatit decided to make a strong push in the self-storage online industry and began to tailor new services specific to the industry. Automatit has since then developed custom applications such as the SiteLink Web Extender and Storage Gateway for self-storage facilities to accept online reservation and payments on a secure and user-friendly web page.
